bodyEn: It’s a beautiful hanging ornament, lovely gift or decoration. The dolls are each with their own personality. They suit best as decoration items and are made either standing or sitting. The felt dolls measure about 5-6 cm and they are made from sheep wool and chenille stem. The ballerina dolls are 13-14 cm.
bodyEt: Vildist nukud on armsad kingitused või ilusad riputatavad dekoratsioonid. Need on valmistatud nõelviltimistehnikas lambavillast ja karvatraadist. Nukud sobivad kodu kaunistamiseks, nad on seisavad, istuvad ja riputatavad. Vildist nukkude mõõtmed on 5-6 cm. Baleriin nukud on 13-14 cm.
